name: Granny 5: Time To Wake Up
description:
You are the victim of a nightmare in an "abandoned" hotel. Your task is to survive and leave the nightmare. Difficulties will await you.

-Granny and her Daughter hear everything.

-Try to avoid traps.

-Slendrina in the scary cellar will interfere with your play, turn away as soon as possible to avoid the consequences. #fangame #adventure #horror #retro #puzzle
